mapper.select:
SELECT a.`id`, a.`category_id`, a.`title`, a.`content`, a.`images`, a.`user_id`, a.`realname`, a.`avatar`, a.`share_num`, IFNULL(e.`likes_num`,0) as likes_num, a.`state`, a.`top` , a.`create_time`, d.item_text as category_text, IF(a.state='0','显示','禁言') as state_text, IFNULL(b.reply_num,0) as reply_num , IFNULL(c.fans_num,0) as fans_num from t_post_bar a LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_bar_id,count(1) as reply_num from t_reply_bar GROUP BY post_bar_id) b on a.id = b.post_bar_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_bar_id,count(1) fans_num from t_user_bar GROUP BY post_bar_id) c on a.id = c.post_bar_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_bar_id,count(1) as likes_num from t_bar_likes GROUP BY post_bar_id) e on a.id = e.post_bar_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item d on a.category_id = d.id
ORDER BY a.top,a.create_time desc limit #{start},#{size}
